name: BSNL Tariffs
description: BSNL Tariff App gives facility to explore the various available plans of different services provided by BSNL. This app provides access to Available plans for Services like Landline, Broadband , FTTH, Mobile-Postpaid, Mobile- Prepaid(Plan Migration Vouchers, STV)  Also this App provides the details of Popular Plans for different services of BSNL  All the tariff displayed are based on the state selected by user.  State selection is editable. User can change the state and explore the available tariffs for different States
